Following screening , subject receive first dose study medication follow completion AUASS questionnaire first day radiation treatment ( baseline ) continue twelve week . Subjects start 5 mg study medication . The AUASS complete baseline , week 4 , 8 12 . A 16 week visit conduct phone interview .
